name: SPACE SYNC
description:
Space Sync is a retro themed rhythm game that revolves around the Zoid aliens. You, as the player, control the fate of the aliens and their spaceship as you continuously correctly hit keys at certain points to set a high score. The player is intended to play the game multiple times to familiarize themselves with the feel of the gameplay and to set a higher score then their previous one.

Have Fun and Enjoy!! :D
